title: Happy Joyous Birthday to our Dear Mr. Phinney
content:
It’s that special time of year, when we all must raise a glass to our favorite Leo, Tom Phinney. Happy Birthday, Tom - I hope your day is filled with fun and love and lots of great presents!

 [‹ Memorial Arts Charity Letter Carving workshops](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905100638/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36244 "Go to previous forum topic") [Non-Format Interview and Book ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905100638/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36250 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tamye

comments.content:
All the best, Tom. Cheers!  
—  
Mike

Happy birthday Thomas!

[![Thomas welcomes us to the Adobe party](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905100638im_/http:/farm2.static.flickr.com/1266/1024186486_2e289c95da.jpg)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905100638/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/joepemberton/1024186486/ "Photo Sharing")

Many happy flights to you, Font Hawk.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905100638im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/18634509_76b3825e2a_5579.jpg)

(Since I’ve already got my beer in the first photo above...)

Cheers, Thomas!
Congrats, Thomas, happy day and many gleeful returns!
have a piece of cake for me! hope it’s happy, thomas.

Have a Happy Birthday Phinney-us T.:-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905100638im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/PhineasTBluster_4673.jpg)

ChrisL

Thanks all! I now know the Answer, as I’m 42.

Sorry I missed your kind thoughts on the day itself - been busy setting up my new laptop....

Cheers,

T
